Davison Systems LLC

Hands-On Maintenance Software Development & Services Since 1991

What's Included?

  • Personal, hands-on training
  • Complete documentation & tutorials
  • Customized support plans & more...

 

Technical Support

Basic Support

Annual Update Subscription and CD

  • Updates including those outlined in Software Updates. You can download the updated program anytime during your subscription period. A password is required from Davison Software for each download.
  • A compact disk (CD) is mailed to you each year.
  • Installation issues resolved and training up to 4 hours for the first 90 days. Support by email indefinitely.

Plus Support

Annual Update plus Remote Support

  • Annual Update Subscription plus up to 8 hours of remote support per year.
  • Remote sessions for support or training via connection through the Internet.
  • Off-site backup. Upload to the Davison Software and we keep your confidential backup.

Support is off-site by e-mail, telephone, or remote session:

Training

We recommend training paced in short, remote sessions no more than one hour duration. Personnel change, and questions often arise long after installation. Short training sessions bring new users up-to-date. You can schedule short sessions conveniently with remote training.

Special reports

You talk with a developer who understands facility operations.

Initial data entry

We can help build your database. We help import information from old CMMS programs, spreadsheets, pictures, and other documents.

Off-site backup

Backup your data and upload to Davison Software for troubleshooting and a checkup. We can help you restore lost data from previous backups. About Uploading your backup

More Reference for download

  • Shaft Alignment Manual (300 KB).

  • Preventive Maintenance by Handheld PDA (1.3 MB).
  • PredictMate Readings from Handheld PDA (770 KB).
  • Typical Shortcut for Networks (20 KB).
  • Installing to every Work Station (44 KB).
  • Catching up on Preventive Maintenance (PM) (63 KB).
  • PM Checks and additional corrective work with parts (2 MB).
  • Ordering parts from a tree view of sub assemblies. (2 MB).
  • Technical Support / User-defined fields (14 KB).
  • Language Support (Spanish, Arabic, other) (16 KB).
  • About Running help (.hlp) files in VISTA (77 KB).
  • Link to Microsoft for downloading WinHelp32.

Client Endorsements

“The East Bay Dischargers Authority (EBDA) has used Davison Maintenance software and it's previous DOS versions for our Maintenance Management System (MMS) needs since the 1980s. I have found the windows version to be user friendly… The software meets or exceeds all of our requirements for preventive maintenance scheduling and work order tracking. Mr. Davison has always provided timely and personal support as necessary. I would purchase this product again.”


Karl Royer, O&M Manager
East Bay Dischargers Authority, San Lorenzo, California
